definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: The teacher bludgeoned the students into learning the math formulas.
sentences.chinese: 这个老师强迫学生们来学习数学公式。

sentences.english: Parametric models are built from a set of mathematical equations.
sentences.chinese: 参数的模型是从一组数学公式中被建造出来的。

sentences.english: Have you ever tried to visualize a mathematical formula?
sentences.chinese: 你试过在自己的脑海中呈现出一条数学公式吗？

sentences.english: I have to memorize these math formulas.
sentences.chinese: 我得把这些数学公式背下来。

sentences.english: The mathematical formulation of the quantum theory has required the use of imaginary numbers.
sentences.chinese: 量子理论的数学公式需要运用虚数。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
